name: Recursive Dice Prototype
description:
Prototype #5 / 11

This game is one of the prototypes made in a week as part of the "souls-like prototyping" challenge.

  • Genre: rogue-like, shooter
  • Unusual game mechanics: environment generation by dice position

Controls:

  • W, A, S, D - Movement
  • SHIFT - Sprint
  • SPACE - Jump
  • LMB - Shoot
  • R - Reload
  • E - Roll the dice
